info.title: API
info.description: API documentation for the starter-kit project in NestJS. The API allows management of users, sessions and offers various functions for logged in users. Contains examples of authentication, authorization, and CRUD for selected resources.

statusCode.description: HTTP status code indicating the error
HTTP status code indicating the error

idToken.description: The identity token issued by Apple, encoded in JWT format.

firstName.description: The first name of the user. This field is optional and can be provided by Apple during the first sign-in.

lastName.description: The last name of the user. This field is optional and can be provided by Apple during the first sign-in.

id.description: Role ID, where 1 is for User and 2 is for Admin

name.description: Role name, which can be either user or admin

id.description: The unique identifier of the status.

privacyPolicyAccepted.description: Whether the privacy policy was accepted.

createdAt.description: The date and time when the consents were last created or the user agreed to the terms for the first time.

updatedAt.description: The date and time of the last update to the consents, indicating when the user last modified their agreement or the consents were refreshed.

refreshToken.description: The refresh token for refreshing the access token.

tokenExpires.description: The expiry timestamp of the access token.

user.description: The user entity associated with the authentication.

message.example: An error occurred while processing your request

statusCode.description: HTTP status code indicating the error

email.description: The email address used for logging in.

password.description: The password used for logging in.

hash.description: The confirmation hash received in the email.

The email address associated with the user account.

hash.description: The confirmation hash received in the email.

firstName.description: The first name of the user.

lastName.description: The last name of the user.

password.description: The new password for updating user credentials.

oldPassword.description: The old password required for security verification when updating user credentials.

refreshToken.description: The refresh token for refreshing the access token.

tokenExpires.description: The expiry date of the access token.

id.description: The unique identifier of the role.
The unique identifier of the status.

email.description: The email address of the user.

password.description: The password for the user account.

firstName.description: The first name of the user.

lastName.description: The last name of the user.

role.description: The role assigned to the user.

status.description: The status of the user account.

email.description: The updated email address of the user.

password.description: The updated password for the user account.

firstName.description: The updated first name of the user.

lastName.description: The updated last name of the user.

role.description: The updated role assigned to the user.

status.description: The updated status of the user account.

provider.description: The provider associated with the user account.

socialId.description: The social ID associated with the user account.

size.description: Size of the file in bytes

userId.description: Identifier of the user who owns the file

accessToken.description: Access token obtained from Facebook after successful authentication.
Google Access token obtained after user authentication using Google OAuth. Use this token to authenticate the request to the application.

db.description: The status of the database connection

info.description: Detailed info about each component's health

error.description: Details of any errors encountered during the health check

details.description: Detailed health check results for each component

subscriptions.description: Array of subscriptions associated with the user

excluded_segments.description: Segments to exclude from the notification

include_subscription_ids.description: Subscription IDs to include in the notification

include_email_tokens.description: Email tokens to include in the notification

include_phone_numbers.description: Phone numbers to include in the notification

url.description: URL to open when the notification is clicked

web_url.description: Web URL to open for Chrome and Firefox notifications

app_url.description: App URL to open for Android and iOS notifications

name.description: Name of the notification for tracking purposes

external_id.description: External ID for deduplication or tracking

big_picture.description: Big picture URL for Android notifications

chrome_big_picture.description: Big picture URL for Chrome notifications

data.description: Custom data sent with the notification

mutable_content.description: Whether the notification should use mutable content on iOS

send_after.description: Time to delay the notification until

ttl.description: Time to live for the notification in seconds

collapse_id.description: Localized message for notification collapse ID

ios_badge_type.description: Specify how the notification affects the badge count displayed on your app's icon

ios_badge_count.description: The provided value must be a whole number.

events.description: Type of event to fetch (sent or clicked)

email.description: Email address associated with the notification history

app_id.description: App ID for which the notification history is fetched

apns_env.description: Environment for Apple Push Notification Service

organization_id.description: Organization ID associated with the app

players.description: Number of players registered in the app

messageable_players.description: Number of players who can receive messages

updated_at.description: Last updated timestamp of the app

created_at.description: Timestamp when the app was created

apns_env.description: Environment for Apple Push Notification Service

organization_id.description: Organization ID associated with the app

additional_data_is_root_payload.description: Whether additional data should be part of the root payload in notifications

gcm_key.description: Server key for Google Cloud Messaging

chrome_web_origin.description: Origin for Chrome Web Push notifications

chrome_key.description: Key for Chrome Web Push notifications

chrome_web_default_notification_icon.description: Default icon for Chrome Web Push notifications

chrome_web_sub_domain.description: Subdomain for Chrome Web Push notifications

site_name.description: Site name for web push notifications

basic_auth_key.description: Basic authentication key for the app

apns_team_id.description: Team ID for Apple Push Notifications

apns_bundle_id.description: Bundle ID for Apple Push Notifications

apns_key_id.description: Key ID for Apple Push Notifications

apns_env.description: Environment for Apple Push Notification Service

os.description: The operating system for which to check the update. Can be either "android" or "ios".

currentVersion.description: The current version of the app installed on the device.

latestVersion.description: The latest version of the app available in the app store.

minimumVersion.description: The minimum version of the app that still functions correctly without mandatory updates.

updateRequired.description: Indicates whether an update is required to continue using the app.

appId.description: AppId of application in AppStore(AppStore Bundle ID) or PlayStore(Google Play Store app ID)

currentVersionReleaseDate.description: The current version of the app.
